title: How to Make a Cream Cheese Pound Cake

steps.headline: Preheat oven to 325 °F (163 °C).
steps.description: Grease and flour a 10" tube or bundt pan.

steps.headline: In a large mixing bowl using an electric mixer, cream the margarine, butter, and cream cheese until fluffy - scraping down sides as needed.
Add the sugar gradually, beating until fluffy.
Add eggs alternately with flour, beginning and ending with flour.
Pour mixture in prepared pan and use back of spatula(or spoon) to level surface.
Put on middle rack of oven.
Cool for 10 minutes.
steps.description: Gently loosen sides with knife and invert on plate.

steps.headline: Dust with powdered sugar when completely cool.

text: Preheat oven to 325 °F (163 °C). Grease and flour a 10" tube or bundt pan. In a large mixing bowl using an electric mixer, cream the margarine, butter, and cream cheese until fluffy - scraping down sides as needed.  Add the sugar gradually, beating until fluffy.  Add eggs alternately with flour, beginning and ending with flour.  Add vanilla.  Pour mixture in prepared pan and use back of spatula(or spoon) to level surface.  Put on middle rack of oven.  Bake for 1 hour and 25 minutes.  Cool for 10 minutes. Gently loosen sides with knife and invert on plate. Dust with powdered sugar when completely cool.
